title: CaraClip – Vacuum-Formed Packaging Design
description: A packaging project utilizing vacuum forming techniques to create a retail-ready blister pack for a 3D-printed carabiner.
details: CaraClip focuses on designing a two-layer blister package to securely display a 3D-printed carabiner. The project involved creating precise 3D-printed molds, experimenting with air-dry clay alternatives, and refining vacuum forming processes to achieve a professional finish. The final packaging includes a clear plastic cover and a printed back card, assembled with attention to detail to hide seams and ensure product protection during transport.
